mapper.update: update DETECTION_INSTRUMENT set SOURCE = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERIAL_NUM = #{serialNum,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, DETECT_ITEM = #{detectItem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DETECT_METHOD = #{detectMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, METHOD_SOURCE = #{methodSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SOURCE, SERIAL_NUM, DETECT_ITEM, DETECT_METHOD, METHOD_SOURCE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from DETECTION_INSTRUMENT where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, SOURCE, SERIAL_NUM, DETECT_ITEM, DETECT_METHOD, METHOD_SOURCE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from DETECTION_INSTRUMENT
